edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.common
Class LSPMetaAttributesBuilder

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.common.LSPMetaAttributesBuilder
Direct Known Subclasses:
DocMetaAttributesBuilder
public abstract class LSPMetaAttributesBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

Creates an LSPMetaAttributes. Its concrete method specifies how to read in STARTS XML to create the meta-attributes, while its abstract methods specify how a meta-attributes ought to be saved or loaded.

Method Detail

load

public abstract LSPMetaAttributes load(java.lang.String backEndLSPName)
                                throws BackEndException
An implementation of this method should load an LSPMetaAttributes from some kind of persistent storage
Parameters:
backEndLSPName - the name of the BackEndLSP to whom the LSPMetaAttributes belongs
Returns:
an LSPMetaAttributes that has been loaded

public abstract void save(java.lang.String backEndLSPName,
                          LSPMetaAttributes metaAttributes)
                   throws BackEndException
An implementation of this method should save an LSPMetaAttributes to some kind of persistent storage
Parameters:
backEndLSPName - the name of the BackEndLSP to whom the LSPMetaAttributes belongs
metaAttributes - the LSPMetaAttributes to be saved

fromXML

public LSPMetaAttributes fromXML(java.io.Reader reader)
                          throws BackEndException
Will create an LSPMetaAttributes by reading in STARTS XML from the specified Reader
Parameters:
reader - the Reader from which to read the STARTS XML to build to LSPMetaAttributes
